page.title: 20ACTIVITIES AND CREDITS
page.content: DURING THEIR{SPARE TIME}THE CHILDREN OF STRETTON TAKE PART IN MANY {PASTIMES.} IN THE WINTER MONTHS THEY SPEND MOST EVENINGS WATCHING {TELEVISION. }THE MOST POPULAR TYPE OF PROGRAMMES ARE CARTOONS AND SOAP OPERAS. THEY ALSO PLAY INDOOR GAMES. SOME FORTUNATE CHILDREN HAVE THEIR OWN COMPUTERS AND PLAY{COMPUTER GAMES. IN THE SUMMER MOST ENJOY PLAYING OUTSIDE AND{TENNIS, ROUNDERS, RALLY {1.2.3.}AND{FOOTBALL}ARE FAVOURITES. THEY ALSO GO{HORSERIDING, BIKE RIDING, {DANCING}AND{SWIMMING.}SOMETIMES DURING THE SUMMER MONTHS PEOPLE GET TOGETHER AND MAKE{DENS,}THESE ARE USED FOR 'CLUB' MEETINGS AND PLANNING ATTACKS ON OTHER DENS.DURING THE SIX WEEKS SUMMER HOLIDAY, PLAY SCHEMES OPERATE FOR TWO WEEKS. . SURVEY AND TEXT BY CLASS 2L 1984/5 KNIGHTLOW C.E.(AIDED) MIDDLE SCHOOL
